pageProduct.name: Sambucol Cold & Flu 24 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol Cold & Flu capsules contain highly concentrated black elderberries, which may help reduce the length of your cold!

MAY HELP YOU GET BETTER FASTER!
Sambucol Cold & Flu capsules contain highly concentrated black elderberries, which may help reduce the length of your cold! Sambucol Cold & Flu capsules may help cut the duration of cold and flu symptoms so you may feel better faster.

Sambucol Cold & Flu capsules help reduce the severity of cold & flu symptoms including:

-Runny nose
-Congestion
-Cough
-Sneezing
-Sore throat
-Fatigue

Suitable For: Adults

Size: 24

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Contains Sulfites. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Dosage form: Hard Capsules

Quantity: 24 capsules

Active ingredients per capsule:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry
-Equiv. fresh juice 3.8 g
Contains Sulfites

Contains: Sambucus nigra (Black elderberry) fruit juice dry equiv. to fresh juice 3.8g

Allergen Contains: Sulphites| Sugars








Directions

Adults only: 2 capsules 3 times a day.

Best taken at first sign of cold and flu symptoms - within 48hours of the onset of symptoms. Or as recommended by your health care practitioner.

If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Seek medical advice before using during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice.

Store below 25°C

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25C. Keep out of reach of children.
